original_title: Si corre o vuela... a la cazuela
overview: If It Runs or It Flyes... It Ends at the Pot shows the gastronomic wealth of the people Hñähñu by living with the Cruz Ramirez family. We visit along with them the Mezquital Valley collecting the scarce local flora and fauna as a method of survival. The whole family is involved to create a unique and extraordinary cuisine which respects nature, inherited from pre-Hispanic times.
title: If It Runs or It Flyes...It Ends at the Pot
